McIntyre Python Library¶

This is a collection of functions and classes that are generally useful for a variety of bioinformatic processes.

BAM Files¶

This is a basic class for dealing with bam files.

mclib.bam.avg_pileups(pileups, fudgeFactor=False)[source]¶

Average a list of pileup dictionaries

pileups (list) = List of pileup dictionaries fudgeFactor (bool) = do you want normalization or not

A new dcitionary containing the average coverage for each base

mclib.bam.sum_pileups(pileups)[source]¶

Sum a list of pileup dictionaries

pileups (list) = List of pileup dictionaries

A new dcitionary containing the sum for each base

BED Files¶

This is a basic class for dealing with bam files.

class mclib.bed.Bed(filename, keys=None)[source]¶

Basic class to handle the reading and access of BED files. A BED object can be genereted by:

myBedObject = mclib.Bed(filename)

get_all_rows()[source]¶

Returns all rows of the BED file

get_rows(name='', exact=True)[source]¶

Returns a specific row based on a name given by the user. Looks first in the ‘name’ column 4, then in the ‘chrom’ column 1. If no name is given then all rows are returned.

myBedObject.get_rows(name=”F10001_SI”)

class mclib.bed.BedRow(line, parent=None)[source]¶

Basic class to represnt a row in a BED file.

GFF Files¶

This is a basic class for dealing with bam files.

class mclib.gff.FlyGene(geneName='', gffObject=None)[source]¶

A class to build a complete gene object with transcript and exon information from the FlyGFF object

Arguments: geneName (str) = a gene name gffObject = a mclib gene object

Attributes: gene = geneName db = gffObject transID = List of transcript ids transCnt = Number of transcripts transcript = Dictionary of transcript IDs that contain the following:

exons = List of all exon coords (start, end). cds = List of all coding sequence coords (start, end). utr = List of UTR region coordinates [3’UTR coords, 5’UTR coords].
class mclib.gff.FlyGff(filename, force=False, merge='merge')[source]¶

Flybase specific class for handling an annotation database created from GFFUtils using a FlyBase GFF file.

Arguments: filename (str) = filename of your gff/gtf file force (bool) = if True force the recreation of the database merge {‘merge’, ‘create_unique’, ‘error’, ‘warning’} = passed to the merge_strategy option in gffutils.create_db()

Attributes: symbol2fbgn = a dictionary to convert from gene symbol to fbgn

get_chrom()[source]¶

Return a generator of a list of genes

get_transcripts(name)[source]¶

Override the get_transcripts method to allow translation of gene symbol to FBgn.
